pullRequest.title: chore(engine+rest): add license key to telemetry
pullRequest.bodyText:
adds utility function in REST API to add license key data to telemetry
adds license key data object in telemetry
handles setting and deleting license keys via ManagementService with
regards to telemetry data

related to CAM-12379

beforeCommit.message:
chore(engine+rest): add license key to telemetry

* adds utility function in REST API to add license key data to telemetry
* adds license key data object in telemetry
* handles setting and deleting license keys via ManagementService with
  regards to telemetry data

related to CAM-12379

* cleans more test data and improves test isolation for TelemetryReporterTest

commit.message: adjust serialized names of telemetry license data

afterCommit.message: adjust serialized names of telemetry license data

commit.message: make `WebApplicationUtil` JDK7 compliant for easier backporting

* fetches license key data from the database on engine startup
  in order to also cover cases of existing license data; only
  raw data can be sent however

beforeCommit.message:
* fetches license key data from the database on engine startup
  in order to also cover cases of existing license data; only
  raw data can be sent however

afterCommit.message:
